categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic platoons

nodes.text: This platoon was in the Galactic Republic's 501st Legion that served during the Clone Wars under the command of Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, as well as Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex." Rex and the other clones of the platoon donned cold-assault gear, and served as clone cold assault troopers during the Battle of Orto Plutonia. The platoon, like others in the Grand Army of the Republic, was composed of four squads. First squad was a member of this platoon. The platoon utilized LAAT/is, BARC speeders, and CK-6 swoop bikes.
The platoon first appeared in "Trespass," the fifteenth episode of the first season of the animated TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, though it was unnamed.
